mapper.update:
update tm_order
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
address_name = #{addressName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_uuid = #{userUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_id = #{workId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
work_uuid = #{workUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_name = #{workName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_order = #{payOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_price = #{payPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tm_order set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, address_name = #{addressName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_uuid = #{userUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_id = #{workId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, work_uuid = #{workUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_name = #{workName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_order = #{payOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_price = #{payPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM tm_order where is_del = 0 and (user_uuid =#{uuid} or work_uuid=#{uuid}) ORDER BY create_date DESC

SELECT
FROM tm_order where is_del = 0 and (user_uuid =#{uuid} or work_uuid=#{uuid}) ORDER BY create_date DESC

SELECT
, round(6378.138*2*asin(sqrt(pow(sin( (latitude *pi()/180-#{latitude}*pi()/180)/2),2)+cos(latitude*pi()/180)*cos(#{latitude}*pi()/180)* pow(sin( (longitude*pi()/180-#{longitude}*pi()/180)/2),2)))*1000) AS distance FROM tm_order where is_del = 0 and order_status = 2 and round(6378.138*2*asin(sqrt(pow(sin( (latitude *pi()/180-#{latitude}*pi()/180)/2),2)+cos(latitude*pi()/180)*cos(#{latitude}*pi()/180)* pow(sin( (longitude*pi()/180-#{longitude}*pi()/180)/2),2)))*1000) < 3301 ORDER BY distance LIMIT 20
